title: Name this college sport font pls
author: camuaejay

comments.content:
PAMPANGA: [Machine ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060412/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/machine)  
ALL STAR: [PowerStation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060412/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alphabetsoup/power-station) Solid, slightly edited (adding a cut into counters) should do the job. A bit more work from [Diamante EF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060412/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/diamante) and aforementioned Machine ITC
